snippet.title: Angeline Era - Official Announcement Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description:
Take a look at combat, the world, and more in this announcement trailer for Angeline Era, an upcoming action RPG set in an esoteric land of Angels and Fae. In Angeline Era, Fire a long-ranged gun or swiftly jump, and with the revolutionary “Bumpslash System”, bump into enemies to automatically attack without pressing a button! Explore the nonlinear overworld and a variety of ancient, lush, or futuristic dungeons and biomes, meet the denizens of the land of Era, and hunt down its greatest Sinners in intense boss fights. Angeline Era will be available on PC in 2024.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
